member.name: M:AppMovile.Views.RegisterPage.CreatePasswordHash(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Creates a salted HMAC-SHA256 password hash. Store both salt and hash (Base64) to verify later.

member.name: M:AppMovile.Views.RegisterPage.VerifyPassword(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a password against stored salt+hash. (Useful for custom checks later.)

member.name: T:AppMovile.Resource
member.summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.
